mapper.select: SELECT ar.article_id, ar.author_id, ar.title, ar.brief_introduction, ar.modified_time, uinfo.nick_name, ar.cover_path FROM article ar, blog_info info, user_info uinfo WHERE ar.article_id = info.article_id AND ar.author_id = uinfo.author_id ORDER BY info.likes LIMIT 0,#{quantity}

SELECT ar.article_id, ar.author_id, ar.title, ar.brief_introduction, ar.modified_time, us.nick_name, us.avatar_path FROM article ar, blog_info info, user_info us WHERE ar.article_id = info.article_id AND us.author_id = ar.author_id ORDER BY info.likes LIMIT #{curPage},#{size}
SELECT count(ar.article_id) FROM article ar, blog_info info WHERE ar.article_id = info.article_id
SELECT ar.article_id, ar.author_id, ar.title, ar.brief_introduction, ar.modified_time, ar.cover_path FROM article ar ORDER BY ar.modified_time LIMIT 0,#{quantity}

SELECT DISTINCT ar.article_id, ar.title, ar.brief_introduction, uin.author_id, uin.avatar_path, uin.nick_name, bin.pageviews, bin.likes, bin.collection FROM article ar,blog_info bin, user_info uin WHERE ar.author_id = uin.author_id AND bin.article_id = ar.article_id AND (
ar.title like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
or
ar.brief_introduction like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
or
ar.label like concat("%",#{keyword},"%") ) LIMIT #{currentPage},#{size}

SELECT count(1) FROM article ar,blog_info bin, user_info uin WHERE ar.author_id = uin.author_id AND bin.article_id = ar.article_id AND (
ar.title like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
or
ar.brief_introduction like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
or
ar.label like concat("%",#{keyword},"%") )

SELECT art.article_id, art.author_id, art.title, art.brief_introduction, art.create_time, art.modified_time, art.deleted, info.nick_name, info.avatar_path FROM article art, user_info info WHERE art.deleted = 0 AND art.author_id = info.author_id ORDER BY create_time DESC, modified_time DESC
LIMIT #{curPage},#{size}
select count(1) from article art, user_info info WHERE art.deleted = 0 AND art.author_id = info.author_id

SELECT art.article_id, art.author_id, art.title, art.create_time, art.cover_path, info.nick_name FROM article art, user_info info, blog_info binfo WHERE art.deleted = 0 AND art.author_id = info.author_id AND art.article_id = binfo.article_id ORDER BY binfo.collection DESC
LIMIT #{curPage},#{size}

SELECT art.article_id, art.author_id, art.title, art.brief_introduction, art.cover_path, art.create_time, art.modified_time, info.nick_name, info.avatar_path FROM article art, user_info info, blog_info binfo WHERE art.deleted = 0 AND art.author_id = info.author_id AND art.article_id = binfo.article_id ORDER BY binfo.pageviews DESC
LIMIT #{curPage},#{size}
